title: Introduction
text:
Early preview v0.1
Deep dive into health data architecture, data flows, and data capabilities across NHS England, through detailed schematics and explainers.
This is a early proof of concept and a ‘living document’ that we are continually adding to. Feedback and collaboration are invited.
Previous version in Zhang, Morley et al., 2023

title: Data architecture and flows: National
text:
Early preview v0.1
This diagram illustrates data flows that meet the following criteria:

On a national scale (spanning all NHS regions)
Occur electronically (data is managed and transferred via API)
Managed systematically (the same process is reproduced across all extractions and transfers).

Each category of data flows can be toggled. These, and source systems, are described in subsections. Best viewed in computer web browser, and in full screen.
